text:
<!here|@here>: this was ementioned in stand up this AM but want it captured for everyone’s eyes - 
WE HAD A GREAT CHAT WITH CLIENT YESTERDAY.  We’re collectively focused on the future rather than mired down with bugs.  It’s a pretty great place to be.  

As a result it’s taking time to align on the tactical plan for 1.1 but we’re getting close.  I have a proposal out to client for approval and once I hear back, we’ll regroup.  

In the mean while, we have made solid dev progress on 1.02 items and Peter and Joel are config’ing our rig for conitnued development.
